title: Patch Notes
content:
edger. Fixed the wrong animation playing for several races when preparing for a Jump. (They looked like they were preparing a melee attack.) Tweaked the location of some barrels and fish at the docks by the Steel Watch Foundry for some fish-related idle NPC animations. Fixed the animation for the Crawling Claw's footsteps. (Fingersteps?) Fixed some knee issues for the running animation used in the cutscene of the Rosymorn Monastery getting obliterated.
